item.title: Opath query language
item.description: Opath is a simple language for object tree lookup and transformation, similar to XPath in function. Data types All data types transferable through json, yaml and toml formats are supported. null - empty value number - internally stored as either 64-bit integer or 64-bit float boolean - true or false string - strings are stored as UTF-8 encoded data. binary - binary data. object - object or map, can contain string-keyed properties array - array or sequence of elements Literals 123, -2 - 64-bit integer values 1.
